channel.title: All jobs | upwork.com
channel.description: All jobs as of July 08, 2022 08:37 UTC

item.title: Fix few errors & need some amendments on my project with React - Upwork
item.description:
I have a project which is fully front-end built with React
there is small bug in my code which prevents me to do build from source code
I want to create buildup from the source code in order to deploy my project on a public server (i.e GoDaddy)
Note: running the project on local host work smoothly but when I try to create build through (yarn build) it is aborting and can not do that.

also I need few amendments in some design of pages.
I believe someone with good experience can complete the requirements with few hours.  

Budget: $25
Posted On: July 08, 2022 08:20 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:Visualization, React, CSS, Figma, JavaScript, PHP, HTML, Node.js
Country: Sweden
click to apply

item.title: Mern Stack developer - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a mern stack developer for a month project.
Need to create and integrate APIs and do minor changes in UI/UX. We have specifications available for applicants to review upon request.

To be a best fit for this project you need:

Ability to communicate clearly
Dedication to meet project deadlines in a timely manner
Knowledge of Smart Commits for our ticketing systems
Write “I am a human” at the top of your proposal
Attention to details
Willingness to sign an NDA



Budget: $300
Posted On: July 08, 2022 08:14 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Node.js, Amazon Web Services, MongoDB, React
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Senior Full Stack Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Want to be a part of an International Team? Here we are!
We are looking for an IT specialist of Full stack development.
Requirements:
-Bachelor's degree in computer science, information science, or similar.
- 4+ years experience as a full-stack, react.js + node.js developer.
- Solid experience with JavaScript and TypeScript.
- Extensive knowledge of JavaScript, web stacks, libraries, and frameworks: Express.js, Nest.js, Redux, hooks , Mobex [optional].
- Experience with relational and non-relational databases such as: MongoDB and MySQL.
- Hands-on experience with Clouds providers - ex: AWS
- Superb interpersonal, communication, and collaboration skills.
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving aptitude.
- Great organizational and time management skills.
- Can work solo and be responsible, stable and reliable.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 08, 2022 08:01 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:TypeScript, Redux, JavaScript, Node.js, MySQL, HTML, API, React, CSS, Amazon Web Services, MongoDB, NestJS
Country: Armenia
click to apply

item.title: Need fixes in the react / node / mongoDB website as per lighthouse recommendation - Upwork
item.description:

We need fixes as per the light speed suggestion and ideal value should be above 90 in both desktop / mobile.

item.title: We are looking for experienced backend developer to outsource a project in Php/Nodejs. - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for PHP (Laravel,core php)developers / freelancers with minimum 2+ years experience and good knowledge in php,Nodejs, Laravel and MVC frameworks, html, css, ajax, jquery, javascript to work in our projects. We are looking for backend developers only.

If you are interested, please revert back to me.

Thank You.

item.title: JavaScript MEAN/MERN - Senior developer/lead- 10+ Yrs experience - Upwork
item.description:
We are a web agency and are looking for a 10+ years experienced JavaScript developer for a Team lead /Project Manager position, you will work with us full time - 40 hrs. per week.

We are looking for 2 people for this role..

Role:
1. Handle a team of 8 developer and deliver 300 hrs. per week
2. Run scrum everyday morning
3.   Develop and deliver all the projects.
4. Handle escalations
5. Providing solutions & estimation for new requirements
6. Merge pull request and check code quality

You need to
1. Have a strong knowledge in JavaScript MEAN/MERN
2. You will be working with multiple teams so communication is very important
3. Available to work in US Time zone is a plus
4. Be available to jump on calls instantaneously, all calls are video calls
5. All work goes through GIT (Bit-bucket), - you don't have to know but as long as you can learn before starting work on project. (Will tutorials)

Share 3 of your best customization work in JavaScript

if your work is good then there will be a lot of work.  Include the word 'bucket' in the starting of the bid.

You will have a paid code test to take only if you clear it you will work with us.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$22.00
Posted On: July 08, 2022 07:34 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:MongoDB, Node.js, Express, JavaScript, AngularJS, React, API
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
